channel.title: Help adding white dye
channel.description: i have added colored whips onto my server and i wanna add white dye to use on whip to make white whip it is a project insanity based server and uses itemDef2 to manage customs and i would really appreciate if someone could tell me how to add it i am very new to coding so please help me

item.title: Help adding white dye
item.dc:creator: @justinleeoglesby justinleeoglesby
item.description:
@justinleeoglesby wrote:

not really this is wat i put into itemDef2 to make white whip case 13360: itemDef.name = "Abyssal whip"; itemDef.itemActions = new String[5]; itemDef.itemActions[1] = "Equip"; itemDef.modifiedModelColors = new int[2]; itemDef.originalModelColors = new int[2]; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[0] = 944; itemDef.originalModelColors[0] = 127; itemDef.modifiedModelColors[1] = 0; itemDef.originalModelColors[1] = 0; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotationY = 280; itemDef.modelRotationX = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56; itemDef.anInt165 = 5409; itemDef.anInt200 = 5409; itemDef.description = "A weapon from the Abyss, painted white from the egg white of a Penance egg.".getBytes(); break;
the model is the original whip model just modified

Read full topic
